General.Name: Anhui Golden Seed Winery Co Ltd
General.Description: Anhui Golden Seed Winery Co., Ltd. produces and distributes liquors in China. It provides liquors and wines under the Luzhou-flavor liquor Golden Seed, Seed, Hetai, Zui Sanqiu, and Ying liquor brands. The company also engages in the general freight business; processing, manufacturing, and sales of packaging materials; acquisition of raw and auxiliary materials required to produce liquor; self-operated and agency import and export of various commodities and technologies; production and sales of western and traditional Chinese medicine; and beverage and refined tea manufacturing. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Fuyang, China.
